entities.name: guests
entities.description: Guests refers to people who are visiting or staying at a place. It is mentioned in the text as 'while they are with us', indicating that guests are present and being taken care of.

entities.name: us
entities.description: Us refers to the group of people who are hosting or taking care of the guests. It is mentioned in the text as 'while they are with us', indicating that the speaker and possibly others are responsible for the guests.

relationships.description: The relationship between us and guests is one of hosting. This is indicated by the text 'while they are with us', suggesting that we are responsible for taking care of them.
